LanguageData.VPEBA_FogofToxin.label: 环身毒雾
LanguageData.VPEBA_FogofToxin.description: 在周身施放毒气，如果有污染累积会污染附近地面。
LanguageData.VPEBA_FogofToxin.verbProperties.label: 环身毒雾
LanguageData.VPEBA_Pollute.label: 污染
LanguageData.VPEBA_Pollute.description: 如果有污染累积会污染指定区域。
LanguageData.VPEBA_Pollute.verbProperties.label: 污染
LanguageData.VPEBA_Unpollute.label: 去污
LanguageData.VPEBA_Unpollute.description: 去除指定区域污染累积到自身。
LanguageData.VPEBA_Unpollute.verbProperties.label: 去污
LanguageData.VPEBA_GrantPollutionStimulus.label: 污染刺激
LanguageData.VPEBA_GrantPollutionStimulus.description: 是目标单位获得污染刺激状态。
LanguageData.VPEBA_PsychicGreyGoo.label: 灵控灰蛊
LanguageData.VPEBA_PsychicGreyGoo.description: 百分比伤害目标范围内的事物，造成污染，为施放者疗伤。
LanguageData.VPEBA_ToxExplosive.label: 毒气爆炸
LanguageData.VPEBA_ToxExplosive.description: 投掷毒气炸弹在目标范围内产生毒气。
LanguageData.VPEBA_ToxExplosive.verbProperties.label: 毒气爆炸
LanguageData.VPEBA_Poison.label: 猛毒
LanguageData.VPEBA_Poison.description: 使目标单位中毒，根据移动距离造成伤害。
LanguageData.VPEBA_Poison.verbProperties.label: 猛毒
LanguageData.VPEBA_PollutionRain.label: 污雨召来
LanguageData.VPEBA_PollutionRain.verbProperties.label: 污雨召来
LanguageData.VPEBA_ToxShield.label: 毒气屏障
LanguageData.VPEBA_ToxShield.verbProperties.label: 毒气屏障
LanguageData.VPEBA_ManipulateGene.label: 基因操纵
LanguageData.VPEBA_ManipulateGene.description: 为目标单位添加新的基因，污染累积越多越有可能获得有益基因。
